weeks.label: Week 11
weeks.summary: The visual identity sprint. Three competing design systems built and staged at /design-lab/strategy. Book PDF pipeline shipped with email-gated delivery. Auth system fixed. Design Lab Strategy Arena live with WebGL, glassmorphism, and canvas physics demos.

entries.title: Design Lab Strategy Arena — 3 Competing Approaches
entries.description: Three design god teams competing for the frankx.ai visual identity. Team Alpha: Cosmic Forge (WebGL GLSL mesh gradient hero). Team Beta: Glass Cathedral (4-tier glassmorphism hierarchy). Team Gamma: Neon Grid (canvas dot grid with cursor-repulsion physics). Full arena page at /design-lab/strategy with live hero previews, card system demos, typography specimens, and comparison matrix.

entries.title: Auth Session 500 Error Resolved
entries.description: Fixed /api/auth/session returning 500 errors. Root cause: double NextAuth initialization and invalid bcrypt placeholder hash. Consolidated to single auth config.

entries.title: Book PDF Pipeline — Generate, Upload, Email-Gate
entries.description: Complete book-to-PDF pipeline: MDX content compiled to styled PDFs, uploaded to Vercel Blob, delivered through email-gated download component. BookDownloadGate captures email via Resend before releasing download link.

entries.title: GlowCard + useMouseGlow Hook Migration
entries.description: Migrated GlowCard, GlowButton, and BlogCard to shared useMouseGlow hook. Eliminated duplicate mouse-tracking logic. Restored authority bar and completed GlowCard section migration on homepage.

entries.title: Brand Icon System — 50+ Service Icons
entries.description: Integrated @lobehub/icons and @icons-pack/react-simple-icons across 13 files. Real brand logos for OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Meta, Suno, Vercel, and 40+ more services replace generic Lucide placeholders. Respects Oracle logo restriction.

weeks.label: Week 10
weeks.summary: The elevation week. World-class design token system with fluid typography, elevation shadows, and motion orchestration. CSS Houdini shimmer system shipped. Liquid glass GlowCard redesign. Site-wide GlowCard adoption. Universe Map launched. ACOS v11 Design Agent Swarm. 86 planning files archived into single MASTER_PLAN.

entries.title: CSS Houdini Shimmer System + Component Playground
entries.description: ShimmerCard component using CSS @property for hardware-accelerated rotating conic-gradient borders. 5 color presets, 3 speed modes. Interactive Component Playground page for testing all premium effects.

entries.title: Liquid Glass GlowCard System
entries.description: Complete GlowCard redesign with cursor-following radial glow (600px radius, 0.18 opacity), specular top-edge highlight, 11 color presets, and integrated useMouseGlow hook. Design-excellence overhaul across key pages.

entries.title: Site-Wide GlowCard Adoption
entries.description: GlowCard deployed across all hub pages. Synced from production deployment. Consistent interactive card experience with cursor glow effect on every major section.

entries.title: SPEC-010 Conversion Fixes
entries.description: Coaching CTA elevated from newsletter to application framing. Community dead link fixed. Homepage voice and credentials refined. LemonSqueezy untested URLs redirected to newsletter waitlist.

entries.title: Planning Consolidation — MASTER_PLAN
entries.description: Archived 86 root planning files into docs/archive/root-planning-2026/. Created single MASTER_PLAN.md as source of truth. Domain-specific plans in docs/plans/.

entries.title: World-Class Design Token Elevation
entries.description: 5-step elevation shadow system, 8 gradient presets, 12-step fluid type scale (text-fluid-xs to 7xl), motion orchestration tokens (instant/fast/normal/slow). Professional design foundations matching Linear and Vercel quality.

entries.title: ACOS v11 Design Agent Swarm
entries.description: Multi-agent design system with specialized agents competing and collaborating on visual challenges. Brand overhaul complete with swarm-generated design decisions.

entries.title: FrankX Universe Map — Repo Intelligence
entries.description: Interactive map at /map showing all 49+ repos organized into 6 clusters: Arcanea (purple), ACOS (emerald), Websites (cyan), Creator Tools (amber), Products (rose), Research (sky). Admin dashboard at /admin/map with priorities. Weekly GitHub Action auto-sync.

entries.title: Week 10 Sprint Page — Revenue Activation
entries.description: Sprint planning page with revenue activation focus. Structured objectives, deliverables, and agent assignments for the week.

weeks.label: Week 9
weeks.summary: The polish week. Design system standardized across 240+ files, brand identity refined with Axi mascot-first approach, Video Vault launched with 132 curated videos, content intelligence network wired up, and ACOS evolved to v10.2.

entries.title: Site-Wide Design System Standardization
entries.description: Unified 240+ files to consistent design tokens. Single void background, standardized aurora effects with subtle opacity and 128px blur, glass card recipe across all pages, emerald CTA system, and white opacity text scale replacing scattered color values.

entries.title: Website Excellence Elevation
entries.description: Centralized motion library with 10 animation presets. Scroll progress indicator. Dynamic imports for heavy libraries. Explicit image sizes on all mascot images. Mascot-first redesign across 8 business pages.

entries.title: ACOS v10.2 — Magic Words & Continuity
entries.description: New trigger system: ultrawork activates swarm mode, deep-think enables extended reasoning. Todo continuation saves and restores plan progress across sessions. Starlight Intelligence fully wired as persistent memory layer.

entries.title: Visual Creation Council
entries.description: Quality-gated image generation pipeline with 3-lens review: Brand Guardian, Art Director, Storyteller. Structural enforcement via templates, blocking council gate, and human approval before batch generation.

entries.title: Brand Identity Overhaul
entries.description: Axi mascot icon in navigation header and new favicon set. CharacterAvatar component with 10 characters mapped to page domains. Mascot-first policy established: Axi over Arcanea characters on all business-facing pages.

entries.title: 6-Stream Newsletter Network
entries.description: Content intelligence with 6 themed newsletter streams: Creation Chronicles, AI Architect Dispatch, Music Letters, Arcanea Transmissions, Investor Brief, Inner Circle. Stream picker with per-stream subscribe forms.

entries.title: Video Vault — 132 Curated Videos
entries.description: Dedicated watch page with hero section, category carousels, video lightbox, and catalog filters. 132 curated AI, tech, and creator economy videos organized into themed watchlists.

entries.title: Product Team Orchestration
entries.description: 6-team agent system for end-to-end product shipping: Architect, Frontend, Backend, Content, QA, Deployment. 5 orchestration commands with independent verification and dependency management.

entries.title: Content Voice DNA & Social Pipeline
entries.description: Codified authentic voice into automation rules. 5-pillar content strategy with Hub & Spoke distribution. Social content queue with voice-rewritten posts and automated Slack delivery.

entries.title: Vibe OS — Phase 1
entries.description: Premium product page with aurora aesthetics. Ecosystem hub with agent definitions. Navigation integration across the site.

entries.title: The Great Transition — New Blog Post
entries.description: Published Why Building Your Own Business Is the Smartest Move You Can Make Right Now. Navigator newsletter edition shipped with themed Slack delivery.

entries.title: Image Style DNA System
entries.description: Canonical visual reference for all AI image generation. 3 approved styles: Dark Premium Glass, Da Vinci Codex, Light Workshop. 7-gate quality filter with anti-pattern detection.

weeks.label: Week 8
weeks.summary: Intelligence week. ACOS evolved from v8 to v10 with autonomous intelligence, safety guarantees, and Starlight integration. Investor vertical launched. Valentine's Day experiences shipped.

entries.title: ACOS v10 — Autonomous Intelligence
entries.description: Five new safety and intelligence systems: Experience Replay, Agent IAM, Immutable Audit Trail, Confidence Circuit Breaker, and Conservative Self-Modify Gate. Intelligence score jumped from 72 to 93/100. Hooks optimized from 15 to 7.

entries.title: Investor Intelligence Vertical
entries.description: New /investor hub with 4 sub-pages. 14 products across dual-track pricing: Institutional $97-697 and Individual $27-147. Adaptive mega-menu with compact/medium/grouped layouts.

entries.title: Starlight Intelligence System v4.0
entries.description: Universal intelligence layer with ACOS bi-directional sync. 8 modules including SyncBridge and ScoreEngine. 109 memory entries synced across sessions.

entries.title: Valentine's Day Interactive Experiences
entries.description: Personal letter with Vietnamese poetry, AI artwork, and interactive piano synthesizer using Web Audio API with Salamander Grand Piano samples.

entries.title: Hook System Optimization
entries.description: Trimmed from 15 hooks to 7. Per-tool-use subprocess spawns reduced from 5-6 to 1-2. Safe for 3-4 concurrent Claude Code instances on 16GB RAM.

weeks.label: Week 6
weeks.summary: Infrastructure week. ACOS v7.0 shipped, 7 research portals launched, claude-flow fully integrated.

entries.title: ACOS v7.0 — Unified Orchestration
entries.description: Complete integration of claude-flow V3 into ACOS. Unified auto-router with intelligent complexity detection, Ultraworld creative swarm, hierarchical swarm topology with anti-drift.

entries.title: 7 Research Portals — Enterprise AI Authority
entries.description: Healthcare, AI Architecture, Agentic AI, AI Ops, Oracle Database, Sovereign AI, and Cost Engineering. 164 validated sources, schema.org structured data, dedicated sitemap.

entries.title: AI Ops Intelligence Hub
entries.description: Full /ai-ops section with 6 sub-routes: architecture patterns, implementation patterns, 2026 model landscape, maturity model, OCI accelerator packs.

entries.title: Research SEO & Discoverability
entries.description: Phase 1 trust infrastructure: methodology page, schema.org Article + FAQPage markup on all 7 portals, dedicated research sitemap, enriched sources with 164 validated references.

entries.title: Family Tree Design System — 15 Variants
entries.description: Interactive genealogical visualization with 15 design variants. Connection graphs, hierarchical trees, timeline views.

entries.title: ACOS Visual Identity — Imagen 4 Ultra
entries.description: Three iterations of ACOS visuals using Imagen 4, culminating in Ultra-quality renders. 9 premium images, 23 MB total.
